name: Love letters Cards
description:
Love letters Cards is a match-game result of one programming practice of the VII Master's Degree in Video Game Creation at the University of Malaga.

Will you be able to find all the couples before the Love meter reaches zero?
Love letters Cards has up to 3 modes or difficulties to challenge you and measure your attention skills and visual memory. 

Special thanks to Eric Matyas from www.soundimage.org (best ambient music ever) and www.opengameart.org  (really interesting sound effects).

I hope you enjoy it!

Thanks 4 playing!
